body.name: Coolife Suitcase Set 3 Piece Carry On Hardside Luggage with TSA Lock Spinner Wheels (White, S(20in))
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 23 hrs 19 mins
features: Five piece set offers a 20’’ luggage, a 24’’ luggage, a 28’’ luggage, a weekender travel bag and a toiletry bag. Three piece sets offer two options. Option A includes a 20’’ luggage, a travel duffel bag and a toiletry bag. Option B includes a 20’’ luggage, a backpack and a toiletry bag
Mounted TSA-approved lock, and fully-lined interior divider with organization pockets, keep your belongings secured and organized in the luggage.

Crafted with ABS for durability and versatility, the luggage is lightweight and built to last. Slide or glide with the retractable handle and four multi-directional spinner wheels that move at your pace.

The duffel bag, backpakck and toiletry bag are all made of polyester fabric which is mild water-resistant. The duffel bag and backpack are both designed with the back sleeve, so you can conveniently attach them to the retractable luggage handle. There are multiple functional pockets in the backpack, making it versatile for different needs of travel.
All items of the set are carefully quality-tested to ensure optimum performance. Contact us on Amazon if you need help for your purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Coolife Spinner Luggage with Duffel Bag, Toiletry Bag Life is where you take it
Peace of mind Built-in TSA-approved combination lock for security of your belongings

Take your side-kick The set comes with the matching duffel bag and toiletry bag, so you can always feel free to go for your last-minute travel plans or quick getaways Ready to go The duffel bag can be attached to the extended handle of the luggage by its rear pocket sleeve, allowing you to go all the way to your destination easily Additional space Unzip the expandable duffel bag to make extra room for more Get rolling On the move with durable 360° spinner wheels Spacious storage space The spacious main compartment features plenty of space for your travel need
Space saving The luggage nest easily inside each other to save more space for you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect weekend set
reviews.reviewText: I adore this carry on! It’s sturdy and looks really cute. It took it on American Airlines and it fit no problem in the overhead and the matching tote fit under the seat as my personal item. It’s a really good size for me for 2-3 days.I haven’t used the lock on the zipper yet but it’s nice to have. The zippers open and close smoothly, too. I was worried it would get dirty easily since it’s white, but the tote is like a nylon material and it still looks brand new after multiple trips. Same w the rolling suitcase.Been using it for any 2-3 day trips to visit family and it’s such a nice set to travel with. Beats bringing mismatched totes and book bags!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, stylish
reviews.reviewText: Love this set! It was perfect for a 5 day trip to Mexico! No hassle waiting for our bags at the airport and the suitcase fit overhead, bag under the seat. I had multiple ladies ask me where I bought it. The duffle holds a ridiculous amount of items too! Great price, great quality and I will likely buy a set for my girls and husband!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suitcases Surprisingly Successful
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set for a trip to Mexico. I used the medium suitcase & the expandable tote bag on my trip. I was able to overstuff the suitcase & the zipper worked very well. I checked this bag & it still looks like new after 4 different flights & loading in & out of the car for 8 days. It was extremely lightweight & the handle expanded to a perfect height (I'm 5' 7"). The handles seem very strong & heavy duty. The only reason I didn't give a 5 star for maneuverability was it didn't wheel as easily on carpet as the tile floors - which makes sense. There is a zipper pouch and a zipper to close off 1/2 the suitcase which helped to separate the clean/dirty clothes. The tote bag worked so well as my carry on - perfect size even if flying with the worst airline, Frontier. There are slots & pockets on the outside for storage as well as a waterproof inside zipper pouch & 2 slot pouches which housed my sunglass case & phone. It's just a great size. The outside slot slides over the suitcase handle seamlessly and made walking through the airport a breeze. Only room for improvement would be to have a nice shoulder pad on the long strap instead of just the strap itself. Once you check the suitcase, you have to carry that & the strap was just a little uncomfortable. Overall, I am exceptionally please with these 2 pieces of the set. I hope the others work just as well. Added bonus, the colors are just really a beautiful duo of dark navy blue and the copper or suede color trims. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely set; the design, style, and color (I selected white) set it apart from the sea of traditional black suitcases.The duffle bag material is quite smooth and it easily slides over the retractable handle. The duffle also has several exterior pockets that make accessing a wallet, chapstick, gum, and/or phone easy. The bottom expands to allow for more room.I flew round trip with Frontier and had no issues with the suitcase as my carryon or the duffle as my personal item. I wasn’t size checked and didn’t have the opportunity to check either item myself, but wouldn’t worry too much about taking either on a future flight. If the duffle is checked by staff in the future, the smooth material will likely help it slide into the sizer thing.The hard shell on the suitcase itself is a little thin, but for someone who only flies three or four times a year, I anticipate this lasting a while but also fully expect it to get dinged up easily. I love that it opens in the center and has a zipper to separate each side.Well worth the $100 or so for the set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing set at an amazing price!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this luggage set. This is the 1st hardcover luggage I've owned and I wasn't sure if I'd like it but this is perfect for a 3-4 day trip. Lightweight, durable, and the wheels are great - love that they easily glide in all directions. Also, in the past any time I tried to stack a bag or backpack on a roller bag it would tip over - not this one! Makes solo travel WAY easier!! The duffel/carry-on bag is amazing too. When you zip out the bottom to expand it it's HUGE. It's been perfect for road trips and cramming a family of four's toiletries inside. The price was so great I was nervous the quality would be cheap but it looks great and has done very well on 2 trips for me so far using it as carry-on luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel set
reviews.reviewText: I’ve needed to invest in luggage for a while. Had a trip that I last minute needed a carry on for. I was able to get this next day. This set seemed inexpensive and was a lot better looking than the others I’d see in this price range. Love the matching tote and slides right onto the handle and the toiletries bag is a great added bonus.Only concern is how dirty it might get during traveling, but that’s likely to be expected with a lighter colored suitcase. I don’t travel via plane very often so that’s fine for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value & quality
reviews.reviewText: My favorite set of luggage thus far! Not only was this set so easy to pack, maneuver, zip, use in general but I got so many compliments at all three airports that I was at also. Love both the durability and the look of them! I recommend them so much that I'm already going back and purchasing my almost 18 year daughter a set for her graduation gift.Seriously though, this is a great set of luggage, go get you a set of these today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a beautiful set
reviews.reviewText: Love it. It is spacious. Smooth rolling wheels and sturdy handle. Easy to lock and go
